query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Guidance on alignment with EU taxonomy
result.description: T33 Discussion with respect to green bond issuance and alignment with the Taxonomy Leader CE Contributors EMFECBC GDFA iNudgeyou Hemma Swedbank Nordea Duration M4M24The definition of what constitutes a green bond over time should be aligned with the Nordic mortgage market where bonds are typically issued for many years We will discuss implications of the EU Taxonomy for green bond issuance in the Nordics and initiate dialogue with regulatory authorities

result.title: Technical reports on project outputs to share as best practice
result.description: Two Reports at M12 and M18 will i summarise on best practices emerging from NEEM to be shared across similar Projects and EEMI national hubs to maximise output and ii summarise best practices emerging from other Projects and EEMI national hubs with a focus on three case studies from the Hungarian Italian and Spanish hubs with a focus on preferential capital requirements the combination of EEM with national guarantee schemes and onestopshops respectively to provide additional elements for consideration for NEEM in relation to EEM market development in the Nordics Best practices emerging from NEEM will be shared in writing with the EEMI network and presented in bilateral discussions with the three national EEMI hubs and the broader network during EEMI events

result.title: Final Publishable Report
result.description: The project will prepare final publications that will include important lessons learnt recommendations guidance for replicators and detailed information on the projects process as well as signed contracts and contractual arrangements Any sensitive and confidential information eg prices etc can be removed from these contracts if necessary The final publications should be professionally designed attractive and tailored to the target group The publications should be produced in national language and translated in English 300 hardcopies in national language and 200 in English The text in English will be copyedited by a native speaker An executive summary of the results max 5 pages should be made available electronically and in the following languages English French German Italian Spanish and PolishThe content and final draft of the publishable report must be approved by EASME before publication
